cli/index.title: index
cli/index.content:
CLI Reference
kano-backlog
                                                                               
 Usage: kano-backlog [OPTIONS] COMMAND [ARGS]...                               
                                                                               
 kano-backlog: Backlog management CLI (MVP)                                    
                                                                               
+- Options -------------------------------------------------------------------+
| --install-completion          Install completion for the current shell.     |
| --show-completion             Show completion for the current shell, to     |
|                               copy it or customize the installation.        |
| --help                        Show this message and exit.                   |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
+- Commands ------------------------------------------------------------------+
| doctor      Check environment health.                                       |
| admin       Administrative and setup commands                               |
| workitem    Work item operations                                            |
| item        Work item operations (alias)                                    |
| state       State transitions                                               |
| worklog     Worklog operations                                              |
| view        View and dashboard operations                                   |
| snapshot    Snapshot and evidence operations                                |
| workset     Workset cache operations                                        |
| topic       Topic context operations                                        |
| config      Config inspection and validation                                |
| changelog   Changelog generation from backlog                               |
| benchmark   Deterministic benchmark harness                                 |
| embedding   Embedding pipeline operations                                   |
| search      Vector similarity search                                        |
| tokenizer   Tokenizer adapter configuration, testing, and diagnostics       |
+-----------------------------------------------------------------------------+
